definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: In addition, we also examine whether there is any substitutive or complementary relation between diploma and certifications ?
sentences.chinese: 而学历与证照上是否存在替代或互补的关系？

sentences.english: Second, the re-registration approval, ban or the document establishments.
sentences.chinese: 二是重新登记审定，取缔无证照经营场所。

sentences.english: The place or the document has been closed down on the spot, the case for further processing.
sentences.chinese: 该场所无证照，已被当场停业，案件在进一步处理中。

sentences.english: If your educational background is not good, speciality credentials or licenses will supplement it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的学历条件较差，专业证照可弥补学历的不足。

sentences.english: We hope you are CFA charter holder, or at least passed level2.
sentences.chinese: 希望您是CFA证照持有人，或至少通过二级考试。

sentences.english: Check for the results of the accumulation of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 取得公认的证照，做为检核知识的累积成果。

sentences.english: Part two: Evaluation and management system of licensure and certification for the headmasters in America.
sentences.chinese: 第二章美国中小学校长评价制度与证照的管理。

sentences.english: One who obtains the principal certificate is qualified to apply for the principal position in any county.
sentences.chinese: 获得校长证照，可以直接参加各县市的校长遴选。

sentences.english: Do I need any other certificate to work on avionics equipment?
sentences.chinese: 我需要其他的证照来做航电设备相关工作吗？

sentences.english: Part three: Characteristic analysis of licensure and certification institution for headmaster in America.
sentences.chinese: 第三章美国中小学校长证照制度的特点分析及其启示。

definition: to renew a certificate (ID card etc)/to leave an ID at the desk to gain entrance
to act for sb else/to act on sb's behalf/an agent/a diplomatic representative/a chargé d'affaires
